# anndataR

Calling python from R and vice versa

1. rpy2 & reticulate
2. How to do this in jupyter notebooks and rmarkdown scripts

```{r}
library(anndataR)

h5ad_path <- system.file("extdata", "example.h5ad", package = "anndataR")
adata <- read_h5ad(h5ad_path, to = "InMemoryAnnData")
adata
```
```{r}
sce <- adata$to_SingleCellExperiment()
sce
```
```{r}
obj <- adata$to_Seurat()
obj
```
